text: Grand Canyon is a 1991 American drama movie directed by Lawrence Kasdan and stars Danny Glover, Kevin Kline, Steve Martin, Alfre Woodward, Mary McDonnell, Mary-Louise Parker, Tina Lifford. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a minor box office failure, but the reviews from movie critics were generally positive. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 drama movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Lawrence Kasdan Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: Grand Canyon (1991 movie)
